alert.note: Alert for Baboquivari Mountains including Kitt Peak; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail; Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 8:31PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...An area of strong thunderstorms will impact southern portions of the Tohono O`odham Nation and south central Pima County through 930 PM MST... At 827 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms near and south of Sells and Kitt Peak, moving southwest at 15 to 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph, patchy blowing dust and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sells, Arivaca, Topawa, San Miguel, San Isidro, Kitt Peak, Gu Oidak, Vamori, Cowlic, Fresnal, San Pedro, Choulic, Newfield, Coldfields, Sasabe, Fresnal Canyon, Artesia, and Pan Tak. This includes the following highways... Route 86 between mile markers 109 and 148. Route 286 between mile markers 1 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
